item.title: Extracting MSEC data from a netcdf file
item.description: Introduction I am working on a project that is trying to understand why some coral reefs are faring better than others. Towards this end, I am collating a number of predictors hypothesized to influence the condition of coral reefs. In this post, I am going to demonstrate the steps necessary to take advantage of this awesome dataset by Yeager et al. 2017. There are two ways to go about extracting the geospatial data:
